column1: Geographic Information Systems (Distance Learning) - Part-time PgDip/MSc
column3: School of Geography and Environmental Sciences
column5: With 25 years' experience of teaching GIS, and nearly 20 years via online distance learning, we have a long and successful track record in GIS education. This course teaches the concepts behind GIS and provides in-depth practice using both commercial and open-source software. You can study either full-time or part-time, and can aim for a Postgraduate Certificate, Postgraduate Diploma or Masters degree.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
